As much as I want it, I can't empathize with the MC, he's a fucking coward, who isn't capable of solving the problem in which he was at fault and also hopes that it will be solved by itself. Easier I feel empathy for the FMC who at least had the decency in the first instance to end their sexual encounters with the blond guy, for trying to fix something that could not be fixed (although it is not that she has put too much effort on it, hentai logic. ...)

Now, the story is too convenient for the NTR to work, however it seems to me that it is a decent work compared to the pile of garbage that there is of this genre.

Hopefully the conclusion follows that same narrative idea and does not deviate to please the fetishists.

(3/3) Since then, Blonde told her to send him her sexy selfies as a daily routine. Theyve also been meeting each other except for that time when she had her period. But soon after it was over, she sent him a video about it and that it's her safe day now so raw time. MC is in tears as he continue reading. Finally, MC managed to find what was it that she wrongly sent to him, but it doesn't end there. On a last video, FMC tells Blonde that MC might have been snooping through her phone. The guilt and the consequences of her actions has finally caught up to her and now she's in a pinch. Blonde suggested for her to pretend to be asleep to test if MC's really snooping or not. As a final msg, Blonde asks girl to leave some words on cam for our snooping MC to which she says: "If youre watching this, you probably know everything by now. So wherever you are right now, pls come back to the bedroom". And so MC did and there awaits our wide awake FMC. TBC.

(2/3) --as couple. That was until he received a msg with a photo. It says: "I've sent our daily routine for today!"
She managed to delete the photo before MC was able to see it. She brushed it off as a wrongly sent msg that was meant for her friend who she's sharing her weight changes with. However, this didn't quite leave MC without some uneasing feeling and so he decided to check it out for himself.
Apparently, Blonde has started contacting her again since November. It looks like FMC hasn't blocked him yet cuz Blonde noticed that his msgs are marked seen. Most of his msgs are just the usual sexual harassment, drunk texts you get from that creepy ex you had lol. She ignored it for some time but eventually responded as she expresses her unfortunate sexless life with MC. So Blonde invited her to meet up but if she decides not to go, he wont ever bother her again. Well, she did end up showing up and they went back to their relationship but now they're just sexfriends at best. --

Im sure the better experience would be to read this when it's already translated but for those who can't wait for it, here's a summary: (1/3) After finding out that Blonde suggested for FMC to break up with MC, he has been curious to know what her response was so he decided to peek again through her msgs. Timeskip. FMC offered for him to stay for the night. He took this chance to figure out what happened since then. He feared for the worst, thinking she will definitely break up with him and insult his dick. After mustering the courage, he saw the unexpected. GF decided to not break up with MC and that she stopped her relationship with Blonde. With this, he managed to get a lot of load off his chest and the couple went back to how they were. Time skip and now it's almost Christmas. Everything was fine except for one thing: Having known how she does it with another dude, MC can't get in the zone leaving them sexless for a while now. But it's fine since theyre staying strong--
